sub_title: Global Head of On-Premises Support at Atlassian
summary:
Graduated as an Electrical Engineer with post-graduation in "Network and Distributed Systems" and MBA in Project Management, I've started my career as a Network Engineer in the Telecom market.

I've been working as a People Manager since 2004, managing Network Operations in the Telecom market, Application Support Operations and Service Delivery in the Software Development market. I can say that managing people (individual contributors, leaders and senior leaders) and helping them accelerate their growth in a complex technical environment is my main expertise.

During my career, I've had many opportunities to build high performing teams from scratch, to add structure, to build and improve processes and, last but not least, to help people grow and develop their strengths.

Strong technical background in VoIP, TCP/IP, SS7, SIP, Cisco, Network Engineering, Network Operations, Application Support and Atlassian tools.

Specialties: Management, Team Building and Training, Project Management, Strategic Planning, Budget definition and control, P&L Management, Quality Management, VoIP networks and protocols, Network Engineering, Workflow definition and implementation, Definition and implementation of new processes and methodology focused on standardization and improvements, Problem solving, People Management, SLA Management, Customer Experience Management, Knowledge Centered Support.

contributors.headline: Global Head of On-Premises Support at Atlassian

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Global On-Prem Application Support team, composed of 340+ employees distributed across the globe (Australia, India, Netherlands, USA and Brazil). My team takes care of all Customers within the Server and Data Center product lines, across all of Atlassia's Support Offerings (including Priority and Premier Support).

I collaborate very closely with senior leaders across the business (Engineering, Product, Finance, IT) in order to craft long-term strategies, keep Atlassian at the leading edge of the Industry and deliver a legendary customer experience.
profile_positions.title: Global Head of On-Premises Support

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the global Server Application Support team, composed of 170+ employees distributed across the globe (Australia, Malaysia, Netherlands, USA and Brazil).

Heavily involved in crafting long-term strategies for the Support area, and working alongside Regional Managers and Product leads in order to execute on it.
profile_positions.title: Global Head of Server Application Support

profile_positions.description:
Atlassian is one of e-Core's main clientes. We have a team of 100+ Engineers across 2 different locations (Porto Alegre and Sao Paulo) fully dedicated to providing support to Atlassian customers in the Americas. I'm responsible for the entire operation across both sites, being the liaison between e-Core and Atlassian. Leaders from Cloud, Server and Enterprise divisions directly or indirectly report into me.

At Atlassian, I play the role of Head of Cloud Support, in the Americas. I lead a team of 50+ Engineers and Leaders, spread across Porto Alegre, Brazil (an e-Core team), and Austin, Texas (an Atlassian team). My main focus areas are to deliver great customer experience to our clients, develop our managers into bigger leaders and help to shape Atlassian's Cloud Support strategy. All of this while dramatically growing our teams in parallel.

In an interesting note, I've spent 6 months in Australia (Oct/2018 to Apr/2019), managing Cloud, Server and Enterprise Support teams at Atlassian, across Sydney and Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
profile_positions.title: Head of Atlassian Cloud Support - AMER

profile_positions.description:
In addition to being Atlassian's Regional Support Manager at e-Core, I'm also playing the Service Delivery Director role for e-Core.

Overall, I'm responsible for a total headcount of 140+ employees, divided into 8 different projects / engagements. I currently have 6 Managers / Leaders reporting into me. My teams deliver services such as Application Support, Quality Assurance and Software Development for customers such as Atlassian, AGCO and Bunge, just to name a few.

My main responsibilities are to deliver on our KPIs (P&L, Hiring, People Development, Customer Satisfaction), while help shaping e-Core's strategy for the long term.
profile_positions.title: Service Delivery Director

profile_positions.description: One of the biggest e-Core customers is Atlassian, an Australian Company that develops outstanding software like JIRA and Confluence. E-Core provides support services for Atlassian, being one of the 6 support centers in the world, working in a "follow the sun" approach with other teams located in EUA, Holland, Malaysia and Australia. I'm responsible for managing the Americas East Coast team, composed of 60+ support Engineers and 4 Team Leads / Support Managers. On e-Core's side, I'm responsible for the P&L of the engagement. On Atlassian side, I'm accountable for KPIs such as Net Promoter Score (NPS) and Knowledge Creation (for self help). People development, leadership development and strategy (thinking long term) are my biggest focus areas.
profile_positions.title: Regional Support Manager
Operations Director

profile_positions.description: I currently manage NOC operations in São Paulo and Porto Alegre, giving technical support for carriers interconnected with Datora using platforms like Nextone, Portaone, OpenSER and OpenSIPs. I also manage the interconnection and quality teams, which are located in Porto Alegre, São Paulo and Guatemala.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description: I'm currently the Chief Operating Officer at GlobalNova Comunicações. My responsibilities are to manage the Software Development Team, Engineering Team, Routing Team, NOC Team and Support Team. Software development for the VoIP industry, VoIP network operations and management, routing management and technical support are some of the activities performed by our Department.
profile_positions.title: COO

profile_positions.description: GlobalNova is a result of a joint venture between TeleNova Comunicações and Globaltel (a VoIP solutions provider, in USA). Since Sep/2004, I've been working as NOC (Network Operations Center) Manager for GlobalNova. I manage the NOC support and engineering teams, including tasks like first and second level support, configuration of GlobalNova's VoIP network as well as development of new monitoring tools.
profile_positions.title: Network Operations Manager

profile_positions.description: TeleNova Comunicações is a leading VoIP provider in Brazil. From Jun/2002 to Sep/2004, I've worked as a Network Engineer. During this time, I've gained a large experience in H323 and SIP protocols, configuration of VoIP networks including  configuration of Cisco routers, switches, the PGW 2200 Cisco solution, Asterisk solutions within others. I've provided support for TeleNova's Broadband, Wholesale and Prepaid Calling Card users.
profile_positions.title: Network Engineer

profile_positions.description: TeleNova Comunicações is a leading VoIP provider, in Brazil. From Sep/2001 to May/2002, I worked as a Routing trainee and this position involved price analysis for routes/terminating carriers all over the world, as well as quality monitoring and routing configuration itself.
profile_positions.title: Routing Trainee
